note:
Writer, news junky, geek, social media nerd. "Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can." - Arthur Ashe. She/Her.

(Avatar is a Power Puff Girls-style little chibi cartoon with a cranky expression, short blonde hair, and blue eyes, in jeans and a Transformers shirt, with a purple witch hat, and orange and black background, a jack-o-lantern, and a swirl of bats. Header picture is a Halloween graphic showing several jack-o-lanterns surrounded by spooky trees at night.)
